timeline.message:
1、support motan rpc
2、the design is reference dubbo

timeline.bodyText:
This filter doesn't seem to work, is the key = MotanConstants.NODE_TYPE_REFERER missing?
like SentinelMotanConsumerFilter.
timeline.author: cdfive

replies.bodyText: yes， I forget to add it
replies.author: zhangxn8

timeline.bodyText:
It is suggested to add a space to the right of =, like key = MotanConstants.NODE_TYPE_REFERER, for better format.
Besides, create date can be removed to unified with other files.
timeline.author: cdfive
cdfive

timeline.bodyText: The origin is "", which doesn't use the application of consumer,  refer to MotanAppContextFilter.
timeline.author: cdfive

timeline.bodyText:
Since the flow rule is inited, here will throw BlockException, suggest to catch it and print the message to console.
Bigger loop times such as 5000, we can observe with dashboard UI more conveniently.
timeline.author: cdfive

timeline.bodyText: attachment.getOrDefault use JDK1.8, should it be configured in the pom.xml
timeline.author: cdfive

timeline.bodyText:
ContextUtil.enter(methodResourceName, "");  The second parameter is used to identify the caller, refer to SentinelDubboProviderFilter, which get the caller name by DubboUtils#getApplication.
It seems that MotanAppContextFilter can be removed, since without it , we can also get the caller application from attachments, by calling request.getAttachments().get("application").
timeline.author: cdfive

timeline.bodyText: Format the line will be better.
timeline.author: cdfive

timeline.bodyText: Class comment could be corresponding or just removed.

replies.bodyText:
Refer to
com.alibaba.csp.sentinel.context.Context
com.alibaba.csp.sentinel.adapter.dubbo.SentinelDubboProviderFilter and other classes.
add lisence header at the top of class file:
/*
